activities.title: Bilingual Story Swap
activities.description: Read a short book and pause to let her guess what happens next. Start in English, and ask her to continue in Spanish (or vice versa).

activities.title: Rhyming Basket Game
activities.description: Pick an object (e.g., 'ball'), and challenge her to find something that rhymes ('wall'). Do this in both languages!

activities.title: Labeling the House
activities.description: Use sticky notes to label chair/silla, door/puerta, etc. Have her walk around, say the words, and remove them one by one as a game.

activities.title: Freeze Dance â€“ Memory Mode
activities.description: Play one of her favorite dances but randomly pause the music and ask: 'What move comes next?' Let her show you!

activities.title: Animal Walk Races
activities.description: Call out an animal, and she must move like it: Jump like a frog, Gallop like a horse, Crawl like a bear

activities.title: Skipping & Hopping Practice
activities.description: Try hopping on one foot (with support) and practice skipping in a fun, no-pressure way.

activities.title: Number Jump
activities.description: Lay out numbered papers (1-20) on the floor. Call out a number, and she must jump to it. Help her with 14 & 19!

activities.title: Sorting & Patterns Game
activities.description: Give her objects to sort by color, shape, or size (buttons, socks, toys). Make color patterns and ask, 'What comes next?'

activities.title: DIY 'More or Less' Cooking Game
activities.description: Let her pour small amounts of rice into bowls. Ask, 'Which bowl has more?' Then switch them up!

activities.title: Shadow Drawing
activities.description: Place a toy under a light and trace its shadow onto paper. Let her 'decorate' the shadow.

activities.title: DIY Lacing Beads
activities.description: Thread large pasta pieces on a shoelace or pipe cleaner. Try making color patterns while threading!

activities.title: Kitchen Helper
activities.description: Have her help mix, pour, and scoop ingredients while making something simple like pancakes.

activities.title: Sound Matching Game
activities.description: Play different sounds (claps, stomps, instruments) and ask her to match them by repeating the sound.

activities.title: Dance Instructor Mode
activities.description: Let her teach YOU a dance! Encourage her to give instructions like, 'Now spin! Now jump!'

activities.title: Sing & Translate
activities.description: Take a familiar song and switch between Spanish & English as you sing.

activities.title: Nature Color Hunt
activities.description: Go outside and find objects that match colors: 'Find something red! Now something green!'

activities.title: Sink or Float Science
activities.description: Give her different objects and have her guess if they will float or sink before testing.

activities.title: Build a 'Doll House'
activities.description: Let her stack boxes, blocks, or cushions to build a house for her dolls.

activities.title: Role-Playing 'Doctor'
activities.description: Give her a toy stethoscope or spoon as a 'doctor tool.' Pretend to be sick, and let her ask questions and 'treat' you.

activities.title: Playdate or Puppet Show
activities.description: If she has a friend around, let them play freely. If not, use puppets to create a small conversation.

activities.title: Poop Storytime
activities.description: Make up a story about a doll who is scared to poop. Act out the doll getting comfortable and using the potty.
